review: This is the greatest thing ever! I had amazon prime for almost 2 years before purchasing this. I watched everything on my phone and after a while it became annoying. I did not want to purchase the other ones similar to this because I don't play games and I did not want all the extra stuff. I bought this a month ago and it works beautifully. Instillation was a breeze. Everyone in the house loves using it. BUY IT!
author: Nina
